message: I feel like I just had a nightmare. My heart is pounding and I'm drenched in sweat.
A word rises to the surface of my thoughts.
I need to take my medicine...
That's when it finally hits me.
The ballroom is silent. Everyone has collapsed.
I remember coming in here after Ren... and then...
A memory rides the pain into my skull. It's vague, like a dream from long ago. I can't make heads or tails of it.
What am I doing on the floor?
What in the world happened here?
I scan the hall. A short distance away, I see a blue shape also lying on the floor.
I jump up and run to his side, the pain in my head forgotten.
I scoop his limp body up, but he doesn't respond.
No matter how many times I try to start him, his eyes won't open.
The blood drains from my face.
Is this related to the issues he's been having?
I swallow the lump in my throat and stick Ren in my bag.
I want to repair him right this second, but it's too dangerous to stay here any longer.
